name: ts-diagnostic
description: - [X] Implement dropdown to switch between Personal, Employee, and Student views - [X] Implement dropdown to switch between different users. - [ ] Implement a comments view to display comments associated with the user.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./frontend/static; tsc --diagnostics; cp -R ./src/js-module/templates ./frontend/static/templates; ./scripts/get-dojo.sh; mv dojo frontend/static; mv dijit frontend/static; mv dojox frontend/static; cp src/js-module/index.html frontend/static/index.html

author: Zhiheng Lu
